trans-unit.source: Represents a mutable reference type that wraps either a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Buffer*> or a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Stream*>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en ruletemplatevariable Referansetype som bryter enten en <> </> *> eller <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> class based on the specified byte array.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> klassen basert på den angitte Bytematrisen.

trans-unit.source: If a null reference is passed in, the instance is set to null.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en nullreferanse innsendte, forekomsten er satt til null.

trans-unit.source: The array of unsigned bytes.
trans-unit.target: Bytematrise uten fortegn.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> class based on the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> klassen basert på den angitte <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: If a null reference is passed in, the instance is set to null.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en nullreferanse innsendte, forekomsten er satt til null.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> class based on the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> klassen basert på den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>verdi.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If a null reference is passed in, the instance is set to null.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en nullreferanse innsendte, forekomsten er satt til null.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the internal buffer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en referanse til den interne bufferen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a null reference for null value <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en nullreferanse for nullverdi <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> for stream-wrapped instances of <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>.
trans-unit.target: Viser en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>for dataflyten som er pakket forekomster av <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the internal buffer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en referanse til den interne bufferen.

trans-unit.source: For <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instances created on top of unmanaged pointers, it returns a managed copy of the internal buffer.
trans-unit.target: For <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomster opprettet på uforvaltede pekere, returneres en administrert kopi av den interne bufferen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer datadefinisjonsspråk for XML-skjema (XSD) for den angitte <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaSet" name="XmlSchemaSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> som angir XSD for det angitte <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaSet" name="XmlSchemaSet" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> is null.
trans-unit.target: Henter en boolsk verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> er null.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> is null, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> er null, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ellers.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int64> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>verdi.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Byte>verdi.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the value that is contained in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden på verdien som ligger i den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int64> value representing the length of the value that is contained in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>verdien som representerer lengden på verdien som ligger i den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 if no buffer is available to the instance or if the value is null.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer -1 Hvis det finnes ingen buffer til forekomsten, eller hvis verdien er null.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length*> for a stream-wrapped instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length*>for en dataflyt som er pakket forekomst.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Length*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum length of the value of the internal buffer of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den maksimale lengden på verdien for den interne bufferen for dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: A long representing the maximum length of the value of the internal buffer.
trans-unit.target: En lang som representerer den maksimale lengden på verdien for den interne bufferen.

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 for a stream-wrapped <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer -1 for en dataflyt tekstbryting <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a null instance of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en null-forekomst av dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance in such a way that <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.IsNull*> returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en forekomst slik som <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.IsNull*>returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.IsNull*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Copies bytes from this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance to the passed-in buffer and returns the number of copied bytes.
trans-unit.target: Overfører byte fra dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomst til den innsendte bufferen og returnerer antall kopierte byte.

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to read beyond <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A>, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er gjort forsøk på å lese forbi <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A>, et unntak.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `count` specifies more bytes to be copied than are available from the `offset` to the end of the value, only the available bytes are copied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `count` angir flere byte som skal kopieres enn det som er tilgjengelig fra den `offset` bare tilgjengelige byte kopieres til slutten av verdien.

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the destination buffer is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak hvis målbufferen er en nullreferanse.

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the destination buffer cannot receive as many characters as requested.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak hvis målbufferen ikke kan motta så mange tegn som ble forespurt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> long value offset into the value that is contained in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>lang verdi forskyvningen til en verdi som ligger i den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The byte array buffer to copy into.
trans-unit.target: Byte matrise buffer til å kopiere til.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> integer offset into the buffer to start copying into.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>heltall forskyvningen i bufferen for å starte kopieringen til.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> integer representing the number of bytes to copy.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>heltallet som representerer antall byte som skal kopieres.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> long value representing the number of copied bytes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>lang verdi som Representer antall kopieres byte.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Angir lengden på dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This method will trigger an internal conversion to a managed buffer for an instance built on top of an unmanaged buffer.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden utløser en intern konvertering til en forvaltet buffer for en forekomst som er bygd på toppen av en ubehandlet buffer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int64> long value representing the length.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Int64>lang verdi som representerer hvor.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Sets this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance to null.
trans-unit.target: Angir dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten til null.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the storage state of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer informasjon om tilstanden lagring av dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.StorageState"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.StorageState"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> as a stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datatypen for dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> som en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting the Stream property loads all the data into memory.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapen dataflyten laster du alle data inn i minnet.

trans-unit.source: Using it with large value data can cause an <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: Bruker det med høy Verdidata, kan det føre til at en <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>.</xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the SqlBytes data.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som inneholder SqlBytes dataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets serialization information with all the data needed to reinstantiate this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon for serialisering med alle data som er nødvendig for å reinstantiate dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The object to be populated with serialization information.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal være utfylt med serialisering informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The destination context of the serialization.
trans-unit.target: Mål-konteksten for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet støtter infrastrukturen i .NET Framework, og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: Constructs and returns a <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> from this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Bygger og returnerer en <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref> fra dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> from this instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref> fra denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Returns a managed copy of the value held by this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en administrert kopi av verdien holdes av dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a null reference for null value <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en nullreferanse for nullverdi <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>

trans-unit.source: The value of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> som en bytematrise.

trans-unit.source: Copies bytes from the passed-in buffer to this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Overfører byte fra bufferen som ble sendt i dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If this operation writes to a position beyond <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A> but within <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A> is updated to reflect the new ending position.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne operasjonen skriver til en plassering utenfor <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A>men i <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A>er oppdatert for å vise nye sluttverdi plasseringen.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of `offsetInBuffer` must be less than or equal to <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for `offsetInBuffer` må være mindre enn eller lik <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak ellers.

trans-unit.source: Only a value of 0 can be specified when writing to a null value instance.
trans-unit.target: Bare verdien 0 kan angis under skriving til en nullverdi-forekomst.

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to write beyond <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A>, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er gjort forsøk på å skrive utover <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A>, et unntak.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> long value offset into the value that is contained in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>lang verdi forskyvningen til en verdi som ligger i den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The byte array buffer to copy into.
trans-unit.target: Byte matrise buffer til å kopiere til.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> integer offset into the buffer to start copying into.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>heltall forskyvningen i bufferen for å starte kopieringen til.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> integer representing the number of bytes to copy.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>heltallet som representerer antall byte som skal kopieres.</xref:System.Int32>
